inline.description: Whether it is an inline element

wrap-item.description: If there is a container that wraps child elements, the 'false' value will only take effect for browsers that support Flex Gap
wrap-item.description_zh: 是否存在包裹子元素的容器，`false` 值只会对支持 flex gap 的浏览器生效

:item-style.description: Node style, which is valid when 'wrap-item' is 'true'
:item-style.description_zh: 节点样式，当 `wrap-item` 为 `true` 时有效

justify.type: start / end / center / space-around / space-between / space-evenly

size.description: When it is a number, it is the horizontal and vertical spacing; For arrays, it is [horizontal spacing, vertical spacing]
size.description_zh: 为数字时，是水平和垂直间距；为数组时，是 [水平间距, 垂直间距]

vertical.description: Whether it is vertically laid out

wrap.description: Whether or not to break the line
